caption.center: OSMEL SANCHEZ, Appellant, v. HARRY K. SINGLETARY, et al., Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Hendry County; John S. Carlin, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Osmel Sanchez, pro se, Appellant.
Robert A. Butterworth, Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Charles M. Fahlbusch, Assistant Attorney General, Fort Lauderdale, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
BLUE, A.C.J., and FULMER and SALCINES, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
